an10.216:1.2: Tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
an10.216:1.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
an10.216:2.2: Kammassaka, bhikkhave, satta kammadayada kammayoni kammabandhu kammapatisarana, yam kammam karonti—
an10.216:2.3: kalyanam va papakam va—tassa dayada bhavanti.
an10.216:3.1: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco panatipati hoti luddo lohitapani hatapahate nivittho, adayapanno sabbapanabhutesu.
an10.216:3.2: So samsappati kayena, samsappati vacaya, samsappati manasa.
an10.216:3.3: Tassa jimham kayakammam hoti, jimham vacikammam, jimham manokammam, jimha gati, jimhupapatti.
an10.216:4.1: Jimhagatikassa kho panaham, bhikkhave, jimhupapattikassa dvinnam gatinam annataram gatim vadami—
an10.216:4.2: ye va ekantadukkha niraya ya va samsappajatika tiracchanayoni.
an10.216:4.3: Katama ca sa, bhikkhave, samsappajatika tiracchanayoni?
an10.216:4.4: Ahi vicchika satapadi nakula bilara musika uluka, ye va panannepi keci tiracchanayonika satta manusse disva samsappanti.
an10.216:4.5: Iti kho, bhikkhave, bhuta bhutassa upapatti hoti.
an10.216:5.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco adinnadayi hoti …pe…
an10.216:5.12: So samsappati kayena, samsappati vacaya, samsappati manasa.
an10.216:5.13: Tassa jimham kayakammam hoti, jimham vacikammam, jimham manokammam, jimha gati, jimhupapatti.
an10.216:6.1: Jimhagatikassa kho panaham, bhikkhave, jimhupapattikassa dvinnam gatinam annataram gatim vadami—
an10.216:6.2: ye va ekantadukkha niraya ya va samsappajatika tiracchanayoni.
an10.216:6.3: Katama ca sa, bhikkhave, samsappajatika tiracchanayoni?
an10.216:6.4: Ahi vicchika satapadi nakula bilara musika uluka, ye va panannepi keci tiracchanayonika satta manusse disva samsappanti.
an10.216:6.5: Iti kho, bhikkhave, bhuta bhutassa upapatti hoti,
an10.216:6.9: Kammassaka, bhikkhave, satta kammadayada kammayoni kammabandhu kammapatisarana, yam kammam karonti—
an10.216:6.10: kalyanam va papakam va—tassa dayada bhavanti.
an10.216:7.1: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco panatipatam pahaya panatipata pativirato hoti nihitadando nihitasattho, lajji dayapanno sabbapanabhutahitanukampi viharati.
an10.216:7.2: So na samsappati kayena, na samsappati vacaya, na samsappati manasa.
an10.216:7.3: Tassa uju kayakammam hoti, uju vacikammam, uju manokammam, uju gati, ujupapatti.
an10.216:8.1: Ujugatikassa kho panaham, bhikkhave, ujupapattikassa dvinnam gatinam annataram gatim vadami—
an10.216:8.2: ye va ekantasukha sagga yani va pana tani uccakulani khattiyamahasalakulani va brahmanamahasalakulani va gahapatimahasalakulani va addhani mahaddhanani mahabhogani pahutajataruparajatani pahutavittupakaranani pahutadhanadhannani.
an10.216:8.3: Iti kho, bhikkhave, bhuta bhutassa upapatti hoti.
an10.216:9.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco adinnadanam pahaya adinnadana pativirato hoti …pe…
an10.216:9.4: pisunam vacam pahaya pisunaya vacaya pativirato hoti …
an10.216:9.5: pharusam vacam pahaya pharusaya vacaya pativirato hoti …
an10.216:9.11: ye imanca lokam paranca lokam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedenti’ti.
an10.216:9.12: So na samsappati kayena, na samsappati vacaya, na samsappati manasa.
an10.216:9.13: Tassa uju kayakammam hoti, uju vacikammam, uju manokammam, uju gati, ujupapatti.
an10.216:10.1: Ujugatikassa kho pana aham, bhikkhave, ujupapattikassa dvinnam gatinam annataram gatim vadami—
an10.216:10.2: ye va ekantasukha sagga yani va pana tani uccakulani khattiyamahasalakulani va brahmanamahasalakulani va gahapatimahasalakulani va addhani mahaddhanani mahabhogani pahutajataruparajatani pahutavittupakaranani pahutadhanadhannani.
an10.216:10.3: Iti kho, bhikkhave, bhuta bhutassa upapatti hoti.
an10.216:11.1: Kammassaka, bhikkhave, satta kammadayada kammayoni kammabandhu kammapatisarana, yam kammam karonti—
an10.216:11.2: kalyanam va papakam va—tassa dayada bhavanti.
an10.216:11.3: Ayam kho so, bhikkhave, samsappaniyapariyayo dhammapariyayo”ti.
